data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字

As ____ of ____ Arctic Observing Network, NASA has ____ conducting ____ for ____ than 20 ____ to ____ understand ____ health ____ the ____. The satellite record goes back to 1978 and includes important information such as ice cover, sea surface temperature and sea ice concentrations.
data.partBlankContent: The polar ice caps continually shrink and expand. Warmer th__ normal temper______ have be__ reported i_ the Arctic, a_ have rel____ changes i_ glaciers, s__ ice a__ marine reso_____. As pa__ of t__ Arctic Observing Network, NASA has be__ conducting rese____ for mo__ than 20 ye___ to bet___ understand t__ health o_ the reg___. The satellite record goes back to 1978 and includes important information such as ice cover, sea surface temperature and sea ice concentrations.
data.answer: 极地冰盖不断地缩小和扩大。据报道，北极的温度高于正常温度，冰川、太阳冰和海洋资源的释放也发生了变化。作为北极观测网络的一部分，NASA已经进行了20多年的研究，以更好地了解该地区的健康状况。卫星记录可以追溯到1978年，包括冰盖、海面温度和海冰浓度等重要信息。
